an3.47:4.3: Uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyati.
an3.47:4.4: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi saṅkhatassa saṅkhatalakkhaṇānī”ti.
an3.47:7.3: Na uppādo paññāyati, na vayo paññāyati, na ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyati.
an3.47:7.4: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi asaṅkhatassa asaṅkhatalakkhaṇānī”ti.
